feed.title: Category: Drupal-camp | Random thoughts | Hari KT

entry.title: Dries Visiting India, We Have Drupal Camp
entry.content: Hey Guys, I am Happy to let you know Dries is visiting India! . Dries is the man behind Drupal and CTO of Acquia. So in the week of November we have Drupal camp coming in different places of India . So don’t miss the dates or get engaged to anyother . As per the Schedule 7-8 November in Delhi 9-10 November in Mumbai 11 November in Hyderabad You can see the thread over http://groups.drupal.org/node/177934 . I am not sure about the venue and more details . Will update the post once I get more details . Cheers !
